snippet: The company’s Verizon Wireless venture with the Vodafone Group showed solid profit and increasing revenue as customers spent more on data services.
abstract: Verizon Communications reports third-quarter profit of $2.23 billion, or 78 cents a share, up from $1.59 billion, or 56 cents a share, in year-ago period; revenue rose 4.4 percent to $30.28 billion, from $29.01 billion; data exceeds analysts expectations.
lead_paragraph: The company’s Verizon Wireless venture with the Vodafone Group showed solid profit and increasing revenue as customers spent more on data services.

headline.main: Verizon Profit Rises 40% as Wireless Gains
headline.print_headline: Verizon Profit Rises 40% as Wireless Gains
